ExtendedProperties.Value: وَمَا عِنْدَ اللَّهِ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ لِلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَتَوَكَّلُونَ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseSourceSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَمَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيْرٌۭ وَأَبْقَىٰ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَتَوَكَّلُونَ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: (of) the world But what (is) with Allah (is) better and more lasting for those who believe and upon their Lord put (their) trust

ExtendedProperties.Name: Example
ExtendedProperties.Value: وَإِلَىٰ عَادٍ أَخَاهُمْ هُودًا قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ اعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseSourceSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: ۞ وَإِلَىٰ عَادٍ أَخَاهُمْ هُودًۭا ۗ قَالَ يَـٰقَوْمِ ٱعْبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ مَا

ExtendedProperties.Name: VerseTargetSubset
ExtendedProperties.Value: And to Aad (We sent) their brother Hud He said O my people Worship Allah not
